mapper.insert: insert into combo_order (com_order_id, price, com_oder_date, start_date, combo_id, customer_id, shootting_location_id, shooting_state) values (#{comOrderId}, #{price}, #{comOderDate},#{startDate}, #{combo.co_id}, #{customer.cust_id}, #{shootingLocation.lid}, #{shootingState})
mapper.update: update combo_order set price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, com_oder_date = #{comOderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, combo_id = #{comboId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shootting_location_id = #{shoottingLocationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shooting_state = #{shootingState,jdbcType=TINYINT} where com_order_id = #{comOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select com_order_id, price, com_oder_date, start_date, combo_id, customer_id, shootting_location_id, shooting_state from combo_order where com_order_id = #{comOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT coo.com_order_id,coo.price,coo.com_oder_date,coo.start_date,cu.cust_id,cu.cust_name,cc.co_id,cc.co_name,cc.co_days,sl.lid,sl.lname FROM combo_order coo LEFT JOIN customer cu ON coo.customer_id = cu.cust_id LEFT JOIN combo cc ON coo.combo_id = cc.co_id LEFT JOIN shooting_location sl ON coo.shootting_location_id = sl.lid ;
